content:
I just noticed that on docs.rs, all methods of a type are now hidden by default and you now need to click on [+] on the impl to show them.
Is this on purpose?
That seems like a regression, it really took me 5min to understand what was going on :/
An example is https://docs.rs/aho-corasick/0.7.18/aho_corasick/struct.AhoCorasick.html
Sounds like #84558 which means it's fixed in the latest nightly already.
But Thanks! Good to know its fixed :)

No, I don't think docs.rs ever regenerates anything. But as soon as the next version of the crate is released, the docs of that one will be fine again. (Provided rustdoc already updated to the relevant newer nightly version.)
Which it didn't yet, currently on a nightly from 2021-04-24.
Yeah I can understand why republishing all docs would a painful
